fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[supervisor]] please approve hours for your worker(s) . Please approve or change the hours submitted by clinking the link [[get_url]] Please do so urgently so that workers can get paid for hours worked. If you cannot access the link simply reply LOGIN to this email and a new link will be sent to you. Alternatively you can submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you!

fields.name: Client invoice
fields.message_text_template:
Dear Client, please find your invoice and timesheets attached!

Best Regards,
[[master_company_contact]]
[[master_company]]
fields.message_html_template:
Client invoice

Dear Client, please find your invoice and timesheets attached!

Best Regards,
[[master_company_contact]]
[[master_company]]
 
 
© 2019 Resourcer Software Limited
https://r3sourcer.com

fields.name: Trial E-mail verification success
fields.message_html_template:
Trial E-mail verification success

Hi [[contact__first_name]],

Good news! Your free 30 day trial account is setup for [[master_company]]!

Username: [[contact__email]]
Password: [[password]]

Your portal access is through [[subdomain]].r3sourcer.com.

You can start using it now! Our account manager will contact you in 1 business day. He/she will help you to finalize additional setup is needed and will organize online and onsite training for your company!

Best Regards,
R3sourcer Administrator

fields.name: E-mail verification success
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]],

Welcome to R3sourcer - human resources automation framework!

Your newly generated password is:

[[password]]

Username: [[username]]

You can change this password after logging in!

To access our self-service portal please go to:
Address: [[master_company_url]]

If you have any questions about R3sourcer, please let us know. We would be happy to help!

Kind regards,
[[manager]]
[[master_company]]
fields.message_html_template:
E-mail verification success

Dear [[contact]],

Welcome to R3sourcer - human resources automation framework!
Your newly generated password is [[password]]
Username: [[username]]
You can change this password after logging in!

To access our self-service portal please go to:
Address: [[master_company_url]].

If you have any questions about R3sourcer, please let us know. We would be happy to help!
Kind regards,
[[manager]]
[[master_company]]

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours (old shift)
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked on [[shift_end_date]]. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.

fields.name: Contact E-mail Verification
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]], 
You've been registered with [[master_company]]!
Please verify your email by clicking [[email_verification_link]]. 
Best regards, [[manager]]
fields.message_html_template:
Email verification
Dear [[contact]],
Welcome to R3sourcer. Please verify your email:
Verify email
or copy and paste this link into your browser:
[[email_verification_link]]
Best regards,
[[manager]]

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked today. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.

fields.name: Forgot password
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]],

You have requested a password change! Your newly generated password is:

[[password]]

We recommend you to change this password on your next login.
You can use the following login details to access it:
Address: [[site_url]]
Username: [[email]]

If there's anything we can do to help about login related issues or if you have any questions about R3sourcer, please let us know. We are happy to help.

Kind regards, R3sourcer team

fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign Reminder
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[supervisor]] we have not yet received your approval for the hours worked on your jobsite today. Please approve or change the hours submitted by clicking the link [[get_url]] or open on your computer https://r3sourcer.com. Please note failure to do so, will result in workers not getting paid for today, and can affect the price of your next order. If you have any issues please contact [[portfolio_manager]] [[portfolio_manager__contact__phone_mobile]] immediately. Thank you

fields.name: Trial User Register
fields.message_html_template:
Trial User Email Verification

Hi [[contact__first_name]],

Thanks for signing up!
You’re just one step away from fully activating your new R3sourcer trial account.

Please hit the verification button below, enter your details and experience our cloud-based software! Verify Once done, we will send you an email with your login details and further instructions.

Best Regards,
R3sourcer Administrator

fields.name: Sms Balance Ran Out
fields.message_text_template: Dear [[contact__first_name]], Your sms balance in R3sourcer has ran out, please top-up your balance now to re-activate services. No sms are getting currently sent out and functionality is limited. Best Regards, R3sourcer Team
fields.message_html_template:
Sms balance has ran out

Dear [[contact__first_name]],

Your sms balance in R3sourcer has ran out, please top-up your balance now to re-activate services. No sms are getting currently sent out and functionality is limited.

Best Regards,
R3sourcer Team

fields.name: Sms Balance Is Low
fields.message_text_template: Dear [[contact__first_name]], Your sms balance in R3sourcer has dropped below 20 [[currency]], please top-up your balance now to avoid service suspension. No sms will be sent out if this happens and functionality will be limited. Best Regards, R3sourcer Team
fields.message_html_template:
Sms balance has ran out

Dear [[contact__first_name]],

Your sms balance in R3sourcer has dropped below $(currency should be country specific)20, please top-up your balance now to avoid service suspension. No sms will be sent out if this happens and functionality will be limited.

Best Regards,
R3sourcer Team

fields.name: Consent email message
fields.message_text_template:
Hello!
R3sourcer (recruitment portal) has gathered your personal information through our job advertisements. Do you consent us sharing your personal details with future employer in order for you to find your dream job? Please click on the link below if you agree to! (link in email will have label “I AGREE”). This will trigger candidate exchange and charge company who is buying profile.
 [[candidate_consent_url]]
